packages.name: azure_managed_cluster
packages.values:
cloudServiceProvider: "azure"
clusterConfig:
  name: "aks-cluster"
  credentialRef: "azure-secret"
  resourceGroup:
    name: "first-group2"
  managedCluster:
    name: "aks-cluster"
    location: "eastus"
    properties:
      dnsPrefix: "aks-cluster"
      agentPoolProfiles:
        - name: "aks-cluster"
          count: 1
          vmSize: "Standard_A2_v2"
          mode: "System"
      servicePrincipalProfile:
        clientId: "azure-client-id-for-testing-purpose"
        secret: "azuresecretfortestingpurpose"

packages.name: digital_ocean_simple
packages.values:
cloudServiceProvider: "digitalocean"
clusterConfig:
  credentialRef: "dgcluster2"
  createClusterRequest:
    name: "cluster1"
    region: "lon1"
    version: "1.28.0"
    node_pools:
      - name: "node-group-cluster1"
        count: 1
        size: "s-1vcpu-2gb-amd"

packages.name: digital_ocean_advance
packages.values:
cloudServiceProvider: digitalocean
clusterConfig:
  credentialRef: dgcluster2
  createClusterRequest:
    name: cluster-advance
    region: lon1
    version: 1.28.0
    tags:
      - ali
    node_pools:
      - id: 1
